title: UP-My Mother's Future Husband [2014]
description:
UP-My Mother's Future Husband (2014) 

Air Date: 11 May 2014

Summary: Fifteen-year-old Headly and her mother, Rene, have more than a mother/daughter relationship. They are best friends, going to movies, shopping, and sharing adventures over the past five years since Headly's father died. Headly has just experienced her first romantic crush and wants her mother to do the same. So she and her friend, Willis, devise a scheme to select and introduce eligible men to Rene, so that her mother can find someone to love. After a few glitches they connect Rene with Andrew and his four-year-old son, and sparks fly between them. Our story ends with new beginnings for both mother and daughter, with Andrew and Rene falling in love, and Headly getting her first meaningful kiss from, of all unlikely people, Willis - who goes through his own transformation from nerdy to very cool guy.

Cast: 

Frank Cassini ... Chuck   
 
Burkely Duffield ... Bodie   
 
Matreya Fedor ... Headly   
 
Everick Golding ... Lou   
 
Rachel Hayward ... Mitzi   
 
Chelsea Mae Leung ... Bianca   
 
Gemma Martini ... Mrs. Donnely   
 
Gig Morton ... Willis   
 
Lochlyn Munro ... Scott   
 
Rene Pierre ... Wayne   
 
Sebastian Spence ... Andrew   
 
Lea Thompson ... Rene 
 
Jacob Tremblay ... Connor   
 
Sigourney Wallace ... Student 
 
Ben Wilkinson ... Eric
